column4: and the nurse holding J.R.R. Tolkien pose for a picture in the garden at Bank House. The photograph is used in Tolkien Christmas cards sent to family and friends. The image is reproduced in J.R.R. Tolkien: A Biography and The Tolkien Family Album.

column1: * 1961 - J.R.R. Tolkien writes Letter to Jane Neave (15 November 1961).
* 1978 - The The Lord of the Rings (1978 film) of The Lord of the Rings premières in the United States.
* 2007 - Myth and Magic: Art according to the Inklings is published.
* 2010 - Parma Eldalamberon issue Parma Eldalamberon 19 is published.
* 2014 - War of Words: Soldier-Poets of the Somme is aired.

column3: travels to Gondolin in order to deliver Ulmos message to Turgon.
